p: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923, Methicillin resistance Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) ATCC 43300, Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212, Escherichia coli ATCC 35218, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027, Proteus mirabilis ATCC 29906, Klebsiella pneumonia ATCC 27736, and Candida albicans ATCC 10231 were used for anti-microbial testings of the plantsâ€™ extracts.
